skills.name: Migration Concept
skills.pattern: Incremental changes, version controlled, reversible

skills.name: Migration Files
skills.pattern: Timestamped files, up/down functions, sequential

skills.name: Migration Table
skills.pattern: migrations table stores applied migrations, checksums

skills.name: Prisma Migrate
skills.pattern: prisma migrate dev, migrate deploy, schema.prisma

skills.name: Prisma Shadow DB
skills.pattern: Shadow database compares schema, generates migration

skills.name: Prisma Baseline
skills.pattern: prisma migrate resolve, baseline existing schema

skills.name: Knex Migrations
skills.pattern: knex migrate:make, migrate:latest, migrate:rollback

skills.name: Knex Up/Down
skills.pattern: exports.up = (knex) => {}, exports.down = (knex) => {}

skills.name: TypeORM Migrations
skills.pattern: typeorm migration:generate, migration:run

skills.name: Sequelize Migrations
skills.pattern: sequelize migration:generate, db:migrate

skills.name: Drizzle Migrations
skills.pattern: drizzle-kit generate, push, introspect

skills.name: Flyway
skills.pattern: V1__name.sql naming, flyway migrate, Java/SQL

skills.name: Add Column
skills.pattern: ALTER TABLE ADD COLUMN, nullable first or default

skills.name: Remove Column
skills.pattern: Deploy code first, then drop column, backwards compatible

skills.name: Rename Column
skills.pattern: Add new, copy data, update code, drop old

skills.name: Add Index
skills.pattern: CREATE INDEX CONCURRENTLY, avoid locks

skills.name: Change Type
skills.pattern: Add new column, migrate data, swap, drop old

skills.name: Zero-Downtime
skills.pattern: Expand-contract pattern, backwards compatible

skills.name: Backwards Compatible
skills.pattern: Nullable columns, default values, no required changes

skills.name: Rollback Plan
skills.pattern: Down migration, test rollback, data preservation

skills.name: Lock Timeouts
skills.pattern: SET lock_timeout, statement_timeout, avoid long locks

skills.name: Data Migrations
skills.pattern: Separate from schema, backfill scripts, batched

skills.name: Backfill
skills.pattern: Batch updates, rate limit, background job

skills.name: Seed Data
skills.pattern: Separate from migrations, idempotent, reference data

skills.name: Migration Testing
skills.pattern: Fresh DB, upgrade path, rollback test

skills.name: CI/CD Integration
skills.pattern: Run in CI, deploy runs migrate, health checks

skills.name: Production Deploy
skills.pattern: Backup first, run during low traffic, monitor

skills.name: Failed Migration
skills.pattern: Transaction rollback, manual fix, re-run

skills.name: Multi-Tenant
skills.pattern: Per-tenant migration, parallel execution

skills.name: Schema Diff
skills.pattern: pg_diff, skeema, auto-generate migrations
